statements: DELETE FROM image_data WHERE id = 1 AND label = 'cat';
DELETE FROM image_data WHERE image_name LIKE '%landscape%' AND label = 'nature';
DELETE FROM images WHERE image_label = 'Profile' AND image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM image_metadata WHERE image_size > 100);
DELETE FROM labels WHERE label_name = 'Example Label';
DELETE FROM image_labels WHERE label_id = 2 AND image_id = 4;
DELETE FROM image_labels WHERE image_id = 1 AND label_id = 2;
